When Artie Decker (Billy Crystal) and his wife Diane (Bette Midler) are left alone to care for their grandchildren, the old methods of education collide with the modern techniques - without penalties and with total lack of fun. When the family starts getting out of control, the grandparents come to employ some tactics to conquer unexpected grandchildren and teach them to be children.
